show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: A Tour Of America Today
content:
A U.S. <!--more--> ex-pat writes about his reasons for leaving the country and talks in excruciating detail about what he left behind.
A powerful story.
Homelessness among America’s school children (in this ‘recovery’) is at the highest level ever recorded.
Why the economic system will implode.
A discussion between opposing economic proponents David Stockman and Jeremy Siegel.
Hello, Iraq, we’re baaaaaaack!
‘Clear as Mud’: a quick précis of who is fighting who and who is the enemy of whom… and, indeed, who are ‘frenemies’!
It would all be hilariously funny and ridiculous if it wasn’t so desperately serious.
